License To Surf

29 Nov 1999

This story over at news.com is reporting that Robert Cailliau, one of the original 'fathers of the web', is suggesting that surfing the Web should require a 'license' just like driving a car does.

\n

\nOther than the complete disregard for security, privacy, and absolute loss of anonimity, this sounds like a great idea. *ahem*\n
